source.mdx: SELECT NON EMPTY TM1SubsetToSet([plan_chart_of_accounts],'Default') on ROWS, NON EMPTY TM1SubsetToSet([plan_time],'current_year_and_qtrs') on COLUMNS  FROM [plan_BudgetPlan] WHERE ([plan_version].[FY 2004 Budget],[plan_business_unit].[10000],[plan_department].[1000],[plan_exchange_rates].[actual],[plan_source].[goal])
